fields.label: Connection
fields.description: Hibiscus server connection settings

fields.label: Server
fields.description: Hostname or IP address of the Hibiscus server (e.g. hbci.example.com)

fields.label: Port
fields.description: Port number for XML-RPC connection (typically 443 for SSL or 8080 for direct)

fields.label: Master Password
fields.description: Master password for authenticating with the Hibiscus server XML-RPC API

fields.label: Ignore Invalid Certificate
fields.description: Enable to skip SSL certificate validation (useful for self-signed certificates)

fields.label: Test Connection
fields.description: Tests the connection to Hibiscus and displays available bank accounts

fields.label: Protected Exports
fields.description: Settings for protected bank statement exports

fields.label: Protected Export Role
fields.description: Only users with this role can edit and delete protected exports. Administrators always have access.

fields.label: SEPA Creditor
fields.description: Your organization's banking details for SEPA direct debits

fields.label: Creditor IBAN
fields.description: IBAN of your organization's bank account used for SEPA direct debits

fields.label: Creditor Account ID
fields.description: Internal Hibiscus account ID for the SEPA creditor account

fields.label: Creditor Identifier
fields.description: Your SEPA Creditor Identifier (Gl√§ubiger-ID) issued by Deutsche Bundesbank

fields.label: Auto Booking
fields.description: Settings for automatic booking of incoming payments to ERPNext invoices

fields.label: Auto Submit Payment Entries
fields.description: When enabled, automatically submits Payment Entries after matching transactions to invoices (requires ERPNext)

fields.label: SEPA Direct Debit
fields.description: Settings for SEPA direct debit (Lastschrift) processing

fields.label: Enable SEPA Direct Debit
fields.description: When enabled, automatically creates SEPA direct debit orders in Hibiscus when Sales Invoices with SEPA payment terms are submitted (requires ERPNext)

fields.label: Payment Terms DocType
fields.description: Set to 'Payment Terms Template' when ERPNext is installed

fields.label: SEPA Payment Terms
fields.description: Payment Terms Template that triggers SEPA direct debit (e.g. 'SEPA Einzug 7 Tage') - requires ERPNext

fields.label: Transaction Export
fields.description: Export bank transactions to CSV file for external accounting software

fields.label: Export Account
fields.description: Bank account to export transactions from

fields.label: From Date
fields.description: Start date for transaction export

fields.label: BIC
fields.description: BIC of the selected export account (auto-filled)

fields.label: To Date
fields.description: End date for transaction export

fields.label: Export
fields.description: Generates a CSV file with transactions from the selected date range and account

fields.label: Bank Code Import
fields.description: Import German bank codes (Bankleitzahlen) from Bundesbank

fields.label: Bundesbank Download URL
fields.description: URL to the Bundesbank BLZ download page

fields.label: Last BLZ Import
fields.description: Timestamp of the last successful BLZ import

fields.label: BLZ Record Count
fields.description: Total number of bank codes in the database

fields.label: Import Bank Codes
fields.description: Download and import the latest BLZ data from Bundesbank
